page.title: 01ABOUT CHEDDINGTON
page.content: Cheddington is a little village near Leighton Buzzard.There are woods and hills nearby.It has good facilities like a post office,shop and station. Cheddington station is famous for the great train robbery.There is a primary school with 7 classes.The ages vary between 5 and 12.Opposite the school is the green.Mainly for little ones. There are swings and a slide and 2 climing frames.Some way out from the village there is a church and an orchard.The church is old and a bit unstable,and it is a good walk from the village to the church.There are lots of different things like apples and plums in the orchard. cheddington is great if you like the country but if you dont its not very good.The population is growing fast and they are building more houses.
